mapper.select:
SELECT R.RYXX01, R.RYXX02 RYMC, R.BM01, B.BM02 BMMC, R.GSXX01, G.GSXX02 GSMC, R.RYXX03 RYZT, GET_RYZT(R.RYXX03) RYZTMC, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 0)) RYSX_ALL, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 1)) RYSX_GL, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 2)) RYSX_YW, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 3)) RYSX_XS, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 4)) RYSX_SY, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 5)) RYSX_CW, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 6)) RYSX_BG, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 7)) RYSX_QT, (select FLFS.FLFS01 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND FLFS04 not in ${XSLX_F} AND ROWNUM=1 ) XSFS01, (select FLFS.FLFS02 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND FLFS04 not in ${XSLX_F} AND ROWNUM=1 ) XSFSMC FROM RYXX R, BM B, GSXX G WHERE R.BM01 = B.BM01 AND R.RYXX03 = 0 AND B.BM10=1 AND R.RYXX09 IS NOT NULL
AND INSTR(R.RYXX08, 3) > 0
AND R.GSXX01 = G.GSXX01
AND R.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND R.RYXX01 = #{RYXX01}
AND (R.RYXX02 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%' OR R.RYXX01 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%')
AND exists(select 1 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND flfs04 not in ${XSLX_F})
JL{CZY|R.BM01|BM_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|R.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL

SELECT R.RYXX01, R.RYXX02 RYMC, R.BM01, B.BM02 BMMC, R.GSXX01, G.GSXX02 GSMC, R.RYXX03 RYZT, GET_RYZT(R.RYXX03) RYZTMC, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 0)) RYSX_ALL, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 1)) RYSX_GL, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 2)) RYSX_YW, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 3)) RYSX_XS, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 4)) RYSX_SY, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 5)) RYSX_CW, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 6)) RYSX_BG, GET_BOOL(INSTR(R.RYXX08, 7)) RYSX_QT, (select FLFS.FLFS01 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND FLFS04 not in ${XSLX_F} AND ROWNUM=1 ) XSFS01, (select FLFS.FLFS02 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND FLFS04 not in ${XSLX_F} AND ROWNUM=1 ) XSFSMC FROM RYXX R, BM B, GSXX G WHERE R.BM01 = B.BM01 AND R.RYXX03 = 0 AND B.BM10=1 AND R.RYXX09 IS NOT NULL
AND INSTR(R.RYXX08, 3) > 0
AND R.GSXX01 = G.GSXX01
AND R.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND R.RYXX01 = #{RYXX01}
AND (R.RYXX02 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%' OR R.RYXX01 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%')
AND (R.RYXX02 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%' OR R.RYXX01 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%')
(R.BM01 LIKE '%'||#{item}||'%')
AND exists(select 1 from QXXSFSITEM,FLFS where QXXSFS01=r.ryxx09 and QXXSFSITEM.FLFS01=FLFS.FLFS01 AND flfs04 not in ${XSLX_F})
JL{CZY|R.BM01|BM_CZ|LIKE%}JL JL{CZY|R.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL

SELECT RYXX01 DBRDM, RYXX02 DBRMC, RYXX17-RYXX18 DBJE FROM RYXX WHERE RYXX14=1
AND RYXX15 <= sysdate AND RYXX16 >= sysdate AND RYXX17-RYXX18 > 0
AND GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND (RYXX02 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%' OR RYXX01 LIKE '%'||#{RYMC}||'%')

SELECT A.RYXX01 KEY,A.RYXX02 VALUE,A.RYXX18 SYJE,A.RYXX17 DBED,(A.RYXX17-A.RYXX18)JE, A.RYXX26 SQED,A.RYXX27 SYED,(A.RYXX26-RYXX27)ED,A.RYXX06 QXJB,to_char(A.RYXX15, 'yyyy-mm-dd')DBQXQ, to_char(A.RYXX16, 'yyyy-mm-dd') DBQXZ, A.RYXX20 ZQ,to_char(A.RYXX24, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SQRQQ,to_char(A.RYXX25, 'yyyy-mm-dd') SQRQZ FROM RYXX A WHERE 1=1
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND (A.RYXX02 LIKE '%'||#{DBRMC}||'%' OR A.RYXX01 LIKE '%'||#{DBRMC}||'%')
JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL

SELECT A.WBZT01 KEY,A.WBZT02 VALUE FROM WBZT A WHERE 1=1
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND (A.WBZT01 LIKE '%'||#{XZZT}||'%' OR A.WBZT02 LIKE '%'||#{XZZT}||'%')
JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|LIKE%}JL

SELECT A.WBZT01 KEY,A.WBZT02 VALUE FROM WBZT A WHERE 1=1
AND A.GSXX01 = #{GSXX01}
AND (A.WBZT01 LIKE '%'||#{XZZT}||'%' OR A.WBZT02 LIKE '%'||#{XZZT}||'%')
JL{CZY|A.GSXX01|CZGS_CZ|inS}JL
